title: Commission Regulation (EC) No 1728/98 of 4 August 1998 fixing the definitive aid for lemons for the 1997/98 marketing year
header:
COMMISSION REGULATION (EC) No 1728/98 of 4 August 1998 fixing the definitive aid for lemons for the 1997/98 marketing year
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body:
For the 1997/98 marketing year, the aid for lemons fixed in the tables in the Annex to Regulation (EC) No 2202/96 shall be reduced by 36 %.
When the aid is paid, account shall be taken of advances paid in accordance with Article 15 of Regulation (EC) No 1169/97.

This Regulation shall enter into force on the third day following its publication in the Official Journal of the European Communities.
This Regulation shall be binding in its entirety and directly applicable in all Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 4 August 1998.
For the Commission
Monika WULF-MATHIES
